resources.string: %s must be \"not optimized\" for best results.
This is a %s device, which may require additional configuration to work correctly.
The application has been placed in the rare or restricted app standby bucket. Alarms may fail to work reliably.

Swap layouts to fill available space

[enabled] The widget will switch between layouts depending on available space.

[disabled] The widget maintains its initial layout when resized. Use this with the \"scale text and icons\" option for extra large widgets.
This widget was created with a %1$s initial layout.

Les següents substitucions estàn soportades:

Tots els ginys:
* %d per la data (p. ex. 12 de Febrer)
* %dd per el dia (curt) (p. ex. Dl)
* %dD per el dia (llarg) (e.g. Dilluns)
* %dY per l\'any (p. ex. 2018)
* %dt per l\'hora (de l\'última actualització)
* %dT per l\'hora amb segons (de l\'lúltima actualització)

* %loc per a etiqueta
* %lat per a latitud
* %lon per a longitud
* %lel for elevation (e.g. 385 meters)

* %s per a font de dades (p.ex. sunrisesunsetlib)
* %t per a zona horària (id) (p.ex. CET)
* %id for appWidgetID

Giny solar:
* %m per a mode de temps (curt) (p.ex. "Civil")
* %M per a mode de temps (llarg) (p.ex. "Crepuscle Civil")
* %o for order (e.g. Last/Next, Today)

Giny lunar:
* %i per a la iŀluminació (p. ex. 25%)
* %M per a la fase lunar (p. ex. Creixent)
* %o for order (e.g. Last/Next, Today)

Ginys de solsticis:
* %m per al mode (curt) (p. ex. Solstici)
* %M per al mode (llarg) (p. ex. Solstici d\'hivern)
* %o for order (e.g. Closest Event, Upcoming Event)

Suntimes uses third-party libraries to perform astronomical calculations.

The data source setting allows choosing between different libraries (or choosing between different algorithms offered by those libraries). The default is time4a-time4j.

This setting affects the speed and accuracy of calculations, and may limit which features are available.

For more information about available choices, or extending the app to support other libraries, see the online help.

Date Format: A date format pattern.

Available elements may differ between calendars, but usually include..

E : day of week
d : day of month
D : day of year
F : weekday in month
M : month of year
y : year of era
G : era

[Icon Rising] moonrise 		[Icon Noon] lunar noon 
[Icon Setting] moonset 		[Icon Midnight] lunar midnight 

Share [Icon Share] will copy text to the clipboard.

Winter/Spring Cross-Quarter: The midpoint between Winter Solstice and Spring Equinox; February [northern hemisphere], or August [southern hemisphere].

Spring/Summer Cross-Quarter: The midpoint between Spring Equinox and Summer Solstice; May [northern hemisphere], or November [southern hemisphere].

Summer/Autumn Cross-Quarter: The midpoint between Summer Solstice and Autumnal Equinox; August [northern hemisphere], or February [southern hemisphere].

Autumn/Winter Cross-Quarter: The midpoint between Autumnal Equinox and Winter Solstice; November [northern hemisphere], or May [southern hemisphere].

[Icon OK] Choose a custom event.
 [Icon Add] Add, [Icon Edit] edit, or [Icon Delete] delete custom events.
 
Custom events can be displayed by the app, by home screen widgets, or used to schedule alarms and notifications.
 [Icon View] Marked events are displayed by the app.

[Icon Bedtime] Bedtime mode can be used to schedule Do Not Disturb during sleep hours.

[Icon Reminder] Show a reminder notification before bedtime.
[Icon Alarm] Schedule a wake up alarm for the next morning.

[Icon Back] to cancel without making changes.
[Icon Save] to save, and [Icon Done] to save and enable.
[Icon Cancel] to save and disable.
[Icon Delete] to cancel and delete.

[Icon Offset] is shown when the scheduled time is offset before or after the event time.
Day Light Saving: [Icon DST] is shown when the current time applies DST, or has been adjusted by a similar rule.
Hora oficial: El Sol està en l\'horitzó: això és l\'hora aproximada de la sortida i posta de sol.

Crepuscle civil: El Sol està 6 graus per sota de l\'horitzó; les estrelles més brillants són visibles. Hi ha suficient llum per a la majoría de les activitats a l\'aire lliure sense necessitat de llanterna.

Crepuscle nàutic: El Sol està 12 graus per sota de l\'horitzó; les siluetes dels objectes i l\'horitzó són difícils de distingir. No hi ha suficient llum per a activitatss a l\'aire lliure sense llanterna.

Crepuscle astrònomic: El Sol està 18 graus per sota de l\'horitzó. Qüasi l\'obscuritat de la nit.

equinocci primaveral: The start of astronomical spring; March [northern hemisphere], or September [southern hemisphere]. The March equinox is also called the northward equinox.

solstici d\'estiu: The start of astronomical summer; June [northern hemisphere], or December [southern hemisphere]. The June solstice is also called the northern solstice.

equinocci de tardor: The start of astronomical autumn; September [northern hemisphere], or March [southern hemisphere]. The September equinox is also called the southward equinox.

solstici d\'hivern: The start of astronomical winter; December [northern hemisphere], or June [southern hemisphere]. The December solstice is also called the southern solstice.

Tropical Year: A full cycle of the seasons. The length of the tropical year is measured from one March equinox to the next. It is ~365.24 days on average, with an exact length that varies each year (up to 30 minutes).

Today: Events de sortida i posta per a la data d\'avui.

Last / Next: L\'hora de l\'últim event, i del pròxim event.

Duració del dia: la quantitat de temps entre la sortida i la posta de Sol.

Llum usable: la quantitat de temps entre el crepuscle civil diürn i el nocturn.

Iŀluminació lunar: Els ginys lunars i la pàgina principal mostren l\'iŀluminació de la Lluna en la nit lunar (el punt mig entre la sortida i posta de la Lluna), mentre que el diàleg lunar mostra l\'iŀluminació actual de la Lluna.

Hora daurada: El Sol està 6 graus per sobre o per sota de l\'horitzó. En la matinada l\'hora daurada comença amb l\'alba civil i acaba poc desprès de sortir el Sol. A la tarda l\'hora daurada comença poc desprès del capvespre i finalitza amb el crepuscle civil.
Hora blava: El Sol està entre 8 i 4 graus per sota de l\'horitzó. L\'inici i final de l\'hora blava està entre el crepuscle nàutic i civil.
El nom qualificat de la classe de l\'activitat a ser llençada.

Per afegir un giny has d\'anar a l\'escriptori.

Per reconfigurar un giny existent pots sel·leccionar un de la següent llista.

[Icon Add] Afegeix un nou tema o [Icon Copy] copia des d'un tema existent.
 
 [Icon Edit] Edita o [Icon Delete] esborra temes.
 Els [Icon Default] temes per defecte no es poden modificar.

Proporciona events a l\'aplicació Calendari (fases lunars, solsticis, i equinoccis).

Els permisos de Calendari s\'han eliminat.

Aquesta caracteristica està disponible en una aplicació separada.

%1$s (%2$s, %3$s) 

%4$s 

For best results select an image matching these properties.
